name: Bullet Flat Minor
description:
Keyboard & Mouse controls:

Move: WASD
Aim with the mouse cursor
Shoot: Left Click
Dash: Spacebar or Right Click

Gamepad controls:

Move: Left Stick or Directional Pad
Aim & Shoot: Right Stick
Dash: Right Shoulder or Right Trigger

Helpful things to know:

  • You are invincible while dashing, so dash through bullets to survive.
  • The lightning barrier around the arena won't hurt you--it's just a wall.
  • Each enemy killed fills the bar at the top a little bit. Filling it completely upgrades your weapon.
  • The little greenish blue things with purple centers are energy cells (hit point recovery items). Pick them up to recover energy so you don't die.
  • Each level is exactly the same every time. If you're having trouble, you can practice in Casual mode.
  • If you're playing with a controller, consider using the directional pad to move. It's great for lining up dashes!

This is a game I made in just under seven days for Bullet Hell Jam 2022. Everything except for the music (credited below and in-game) is either a built-in Unity package or was made by me during the jam period.

Please forgive the lack of a browser version; I was unable to get the sound quality up to an acceptable level in WebGL mode during the jam period. I know it's annoying to have to download something, but believe me: you don't want to hear what the Unity player was doing to these lovely composers' tracks.

Music credits:

"Electric Phase" by TRWorkshop (Standard Unity Asset Store license)

"Ardent" by Lightspeed6 (used with permission)

"I'm CrAZy" by Damiano Baldoni (CC BY 4.0)

To the best of my ability to ascertain, these tracks were published under licenses which permit their use in this project. Please let me know if I've used your work inappropriately!
